login.read_and_agree: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions.
login.door43_information:
${door43} is a free, online, revision-controlled content management
system for open-licensed biblical material.

It provides free, remote storage and collaboration services
for creators and translators of biblical content.
login.guest_information: You can choose to be a Guest and keep your identity anonymous.
login.create_account_not_available: ${app} does not currently support creating a ${door43} account. You may create an account online at:
login.confirm_guest:
You have chosen to be known as ${name}. This username will be publicly viewable.

If you are not comfortable with being known as ${name}, you may Cancel and enter a new name.
